channel.title: aprés ski on courtside nyc
channel.description: Recent content in aprés ski on courtside nyc

item.title: borgo
item.description: thoughts service is off the charts back patio in the summer, fireplace in the winter menu highlights focaccia tuna crudo arancini

item.title: rubirosa
item.description: menu highlights low-key the caesar salad was bangin pizza w/ vodka sauce & pesto drizzle italian mini donuts

item.title: café chelsea
item.description: thoughts tables better suited for 2 or 4 post dinner lobby bar menu highlights spaghetti au citron meyer (lemon pasta) panisse (chickpea fries)

item.title: cecchi's
item.description: thoughts when dinner is the night out want to take anyone and everyone i know here menu highlights pork chop cheesecake

item.title: felix
item.description: thoughts res was at 1:00pm, didn’t leave until 6:30 chaotic, lit, dancing on tables menu highlights go for the magnum bottles

item.title: buvette
item.description: thoughts where day drinking espresso martinis is acceptable

item.title: 12 chairs cafe
item.description: thoughts the tables are extremely tight. you will be on top of each other, but vibes couldn’t be fresher. it’s always packed. brunch is lit - especially if the sun is out, the hoes will be hoeing and the brunch will be brunching. menu highlights low-key the schnitzel slaps arayes

item.title: st. tropez
item.description: west village location soho location thoughts came here for birthday dinner waiter so so fun & brought us shots (didn’t know what a gin gimlet was though so maybe stick to wine)

item.title: freeman's
item.description: thoughts they have not one but two different back rooms to host your birthday brunch parents love this place rustic, farm house, ski lodge chic menu highlights spinach artichoke dip
